StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: scrap leather
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: A leather floor crudely stiched together out of scraps.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: patched leather
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: A leather floor crudely stiched together out of scraps.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: stitched squares
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Leather cut into squares and sewn together as flooring.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: tiles
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Leather cut and polished into smooth squares, and laid out as tile.

StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.label: woven floor
StuffedFloors.FloorTypeDef.description: Leather cleverly woven together so that the seams are not visible

TerrainDef.label: human leather
TerrainDef.description: A crudely stiched leather floor. Gazing upon it reminds you of your victories.
